message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,000. I think you'll find this price to be very competitive given its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand your position, Bob, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  Would you consider $10,500? It's a fair price that reflects the true value of this product.
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,000? I'm willing to compromise, but I really need to stay within my budget.
